subject: Re: [EVP-ITC] Did ya miss me!?
author: Misty Dawn
full_text:
Welcome back Rhonda!

Glad ya found time to get some recording in while you were away.

Misty


--- On Thu, 8/21/08, Rhonda W <rhondak1973@...> wrote:

> From: Rhonda W <rhondak1973@...>
> Subject: [EVP-ITC] Did ya miss me!?
> To: EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.com
> Date: Thursday, August 21, 2008, 12:38 PM
> Im bacccccccck!
>  
> Sorry had dead modem and had to wait for cable company to
> bring out a new one, took em 3 weeks!
>  
> So I did a some sessions while I waited, got some good
> responses and actually a few EVPs saying my name and that
> mom loves you....checked my mail when I got my net back and
> got an email from the lady(Pat) that lived next door to my
> mom and whom was a good friend of my mom.  Theres a new
> family living on my moms property now, new mobile home and
> all...well they have a 3 year old son who talked to my moms
> friend a week or so ago...the little boy was telling her
> about talking to a "man with ugly eyes" in his
> room and how he was nice, he wasnt mean, Pat thinks(and I
> tend to agree) that the boy was talking to my mom...my mom
> had realllllly short hair and didnt have pretty eyes, she
> had almost manly features as she got older and it would be
> easy for a 3 year old to think she was male, specially at
> night in a semi dark room.  The boy didnt say what they
> talked about, but they had a conversation and he wasnt
> scared...this happened on the day I got the EVPs in
>  my session.  I wanna get a digi recorder now and see if
> they would allow me to do a session at their place...would
> be very interesting to see what kind of responses Id get if
> I were on her property compared to sitting in my place which
> is 20 miles or so away.
>  
> Anyways, just wanted to share that with ya'll.  Hope
> everyone is having a good week so far!  
>  
> Rhonda
